content.name: com.microchip.mcu32.mplabx.project.net_apps_pic32mz_wolfssl_tcp_client_pic32mz_ef_sk
content.displayName: TCP/IP WolfSSL TCP Client Example for PIC32MZ EF Family
content.shortDescription: This configuration demonstrates creating an Internet client that uses the MPLAB Harmony TCP API to create a TCP/IP connection to a Web server. The connection can either be clear text, or it can use TLS to encrypt the connection with wolfSSL. The demonstration can use either IPv4 or IPv6.
content.author: Microchip
subcategories: PIC32MZ Embedded Connectivity with FPU (EF) Starter Kit
